vanity-url-screen.create-url-terms-of-service-info: Please do not use special characters, offensive language, or copyrighted content that you do not own. We reserve the right to remove or modify the custom profile link at any time. By continuing, you accept the Redibs

verify-email.title: Verify Email
verify-email.subheader: We will send you a confirmation link.
verify-email.confirmation-sent-body: Check your email and click on the verification link to reflect this change to your account.

verify-phone.title: Secure Your Account
verify-phone.verify-subheader: Add a phone number to further secure your account. We’ll text you a code.
verify-phone.code-subheader: We sent a code to the phone number ending in '{{last_four_digits}}'. Please enter the code:
verify-phone.verify-input-description: Your number will not be shared with others. Message and data rates may apply.
verify-phone.dont-have-phone: I don't have this phone with me
verify-phone.prompt-body: Add a phone number to further secure your account. We'll text you a code.

account-multifactor.verify-another-way-body: Don’t have your current account phone with you? Verify your account in two steps:
account-multifactor.account-phone-number-body: Enter the phone number that is currently on your account.
account-multifactor.enter-email-code-error-body: We sent a code to your email. Please enter the code:
account-multifactor.enter-email-code-body: We sent a code to {{obfuscatedEmail}}. Please enter the code:

verification-banner.learn-how-rep-improves-your-profile: Learn how reputation improves your profile
verification-banner.you-did-it: You did it! Thanks for verifying!
verification-banner.verify-account-to-build-rep: Verify your account to build reputation.

reset-password.thanks-note: Check your email to find a set of password reset instructions.
reset-password.title: Reset Password
reset-password.dialog-content: We have emailed you your login info. Please check your spam folder if you do not see an email.
reset-password.reset-password-note: Enter the email address associated with your account and we'll send you instructions to reset your password.

multi-factor.we-will-send-email: If the phone number matches with the number on your account, we’ll send a code to your email.

app-upgrade.modal-subtitle: Our brand new app has improvements to make your buying and selling experience even better. Update your Redibs app now!

app-upgrade.screen-subtitle2: Our brand new app makes buying and selling even better, with new features you’ll love.

inbox-screen.empty-alerts-subtitle: When people contact you about your items on Redibs, you’ll see their messages here.
inbox-screen.empty-notifications-subtitle: When Redibs sends info about activity or opportunities, you’ll get the notifications here.
inbox-screen.ad-tooltip: Ads are shown based on your browsing activity.

discussion-screen.title: Message
discussion-screen.first-message-instruction: Tap a message or write your own:
discussion-screen.first-message-empty-error-message: Sorry, we can't send an empty message
discussion-screen.tooltip-autos-ready-to-buy-tooltip: The Redibs platform AI collects and analyzes up to 40 different data points on every shopper on the platform. This data doesn't just identify a shopper that is ready to buy a vehicle but a shopper that is ready to buy one of your vehicles.

discussion-image-picker.send-error-body: Sorry, we were not able to send any of your selected photos. Please try again.

report-user-screen.title: Report User
report-user-screen.why: Why do you want to report this user?
report-user-screen.block-user-note: You won’t be able to send each other messages or offers.
report-user-screen.success-message: We'll look into this and follow up with you if we need more info.

report-item-screen.title: Report Item

report-item-screen.success-message: We'll look into this and follow up with you if we need more info.

car-buyer-profile.respond-faster-text: Our verified dealers are likely to respond faster if you provide contact information.

location-picker.invalid-zipcode: Please enter a valid US zip code.

browser-permissions-denied-modal.part-1: First, try refreshing the page and tapping the location again.
browser-permissions-denied-modal.part-6: ” if your browser asks for your location. You can always enter a zip code on the location screen.

permissions.location_primer_prompt: For the best experience, turn on location services. Turn on now?
permissions.location_primer_prompt_restriced: To use your location, the phone administrator needs to enable location services in Settings > General > Restrictions > Location Services.
permissions.search_location_deny_prompt: Redibs needs your location to display items nearby.
permissions.search_location_never_ask_again_prompt: To see items nearby, Redibs needs your location. Please turn on location access in your settings.
permissions.post_location_deny_prompt: Redibs needs you location to post your item locally.
permissions.post_location_never_ask_again_prompt: To post your item locally, Redibs needs your location. Please turn on location access in your settings.
permissions.meetup_location_deny_prompt: Location access is required to use this feature. Would you like to enable it now?
permissions.meetup_location_never_ask_again_prompt: Location access is required to use this feature. Please turn on location access in your settings.
permissions.user_location_deny_prompt: Location access is required to get your current location. Would you like to enable it now?
permissions.user_location_never_ask_again_prompt: Location access is required to get your current location. Please turn on location access in your settings.
permissions.camera_prompt: Please enable access to your Camera to take photos!
permissions.photo_gallery_prompt: Please enable access to your Photo Library to add photos!
permissions.photo_gallery_deny_prompt: Redibs needs to access your external storage to select a photo.

To select a photo, Redibs needs to access your external storage.

permissions.camera_deny_prompt: Redibs needs to access your camera to take a photo.
permissions.camera_never_ask_again_message:

permissions.external_storage_deny_prompt: Redibs needs to access your external storage to store a photo.

permissions.external_storage_never_ask_again_prompt:
To take a photo, Redibs needs to access your external storage.

shipping.sell-and-ship-helper: Reach millions more buyers nationwide. We'll send you a shipping label—the buyer pays for it.
shipping.buy-now-helper: Users will see the Buy Now button, they pay your full asking price and the system will auto-accept their offer for you.

shipping.agreement: By posting nationwide, you agree to our shipping policy and

shipping.shipping-disallowed-reason-too-cheap: To ship, price this item over $

sections.title: We’ll email you the shipping label

sections.title: Ship and get paid

description.placeholder: Items with a detailed description sell faster!

photo-edit.error-image-load: Couldn't load the image. Please try again.

my-offers.title: Selling
my-offers.promote-plus-empty: Post items for sale and use Promote Plus to sell them faster.
my-offers.archived-empty-subtitle: When you archive an item, you’ll see it here.
my-offers.web-empty-subtext:
To post items for sale, download the app.
You'll see your posted items here.

mark-sold-dialog.title: Mark item as sold
mark-sold-dialog.body: This can’t be undone. Only do this if you've actually sold the item, either on Redibs or elsewhere. Continue?

item-dashboard.title: Item Dashboard
item-dashboard.empty-offer-message: When people ask or make offers, you’ll get their messages here.
item-dashboard.promo-banner-subtitle: Get an average of 14x more views each day

item-performance.title: Item Performance
item-performance.promo-text-1: Get an average of 14x more views each day
item-performance.promo-text-2: Promoted views show the additional views from your current position

promotions.ftue-section-one-message: Promoted items appear among the first spot buyers see, so you can get an average of 14x more views.
promotions.ftue-section-two-message: Your item still appears as a new post and in search results, as well as on promoted spot.
promotions.ftue-section-three-message: Don’t worry if you don’t always see your item at the top of your feed. The spaces are shared.
promotions.ftue-section-four-message: Want to see how many people are looking at your item? Check under "Selling" for the latest updates.
promotions.manage-feature-one: Get an average of 14x more views each day
promotions.manage-description-ios: To change your subscription visit your App Store. If you cancel, your subscription will run to the end of this billing period.
promotions.manage-description-android: To change your subscription visit Google Play. If you cancel, your subscription will run to the end of this billing period.
promotions.subscription-terms-ios: Your iTunes account will be charged $19.99 per month for the Promote Plus Subscription at the end of your 3-day free trial unless you cancel the subscription at least 24 hours before the end of the trial period. If you do not have a free trial period, your iTunes account will be charged when you complete your purchase. Your subscription will automatically renew each month unless you turn off auto-renew in your iTunes account at least 24 hours before the end of the current billing period.
promotions.subscription-terms-android: Your Google Play account will be charged $19.99 per month for the Promote Plus Subscription at the end of your 3-day free trial unless you cancel the subscription before the end of the trial period. If you do not have a free trial period, your Google Play account will be charged when you complete your purchase. Your subscription will automatically renew each month unless you cancel the subscription in your Google Play account before the end of the current billing period.
promotions.subscription-terms-links-1: By purchasing the Promote Plus Subscription you agree to
promotions.purchased-subscription-message: You are currently subscribed to Promote Plus. Tap ‘Use Promote Plus’ to use your promoted spot for this item.
promotions.mis-all-used-message: To promote this item, archive or mark sold one of your promoted items to free up a promoted spot.

shipping_offer_screen.accept_term_condition_text_part_1: By continuing, you accept the Redibs
shipping_offer_screen.buyer_charged_after_offer_accepted_text: You'll be charged when the seller accepts this offer.
shipping_offer_screen.seller_automatically_accept_offer_text: The seller will automatically accept your offer.

public-profile.currently-this-seller-has-no-items-for-s: Currently, this seller has no items for sale. Check back soon.
public-profile.unblock-dialog-description: You blocked {{username}}. To continue, please unblock them.
public-profile.unblock-profile-dialog-description: You'll be able to send each other messages and offers again. Are you sure?

make_offer_screen.exceeded_max_shipping_price_error: Offer price cannot be greater than $
make_offer_screen.below_min_shipping_price_error: Offer price cannot be less than $
make_offer_screen.seller-firm-on-price: Seller is only accepting offers at full price

accept_decline_offer_screen.prepaid_label_text: We'll send you a pre-paid shipping label.
accept_decline_offer_screen.send_within_days_text: Just ship within 3 days and you'll get paid after the buyer inspects the item.
accept_decline_offer_screen.you_agree_to_policy_text_part1: When you tap Accept, you agree to follow our
accept_decline_offer_screen.buyer-review-info-text-part1: Your payment method will be charged when the seller accepts your offer. When they ship the item, you’ll get the tracking info.
accept_decline_offer_screen.buyer-review-info-text-part2: This offer can only be canceled before the seller accepts.

buyer-cancel-confirm-dialog.title: Cancel your offer?
buyer-cancel-confirm-dialog.body: If you change your mind, you can make the offer again.

decline-confirm-dialog.title: Decline offer
decline-confirm-dialog.body: Once you decline, you can't accept this offer unless they make it again.

accept_decline_offer_screen.seller-confirm-message: We’ll create a pre-paid shipping label for you and send it to your email to print.
accept_decline_offer_screen.seller-confirm-disclaimer: By continuing, you accept the Redibs

shipping-time-to-ship-screen.title: Time to ship!
shipping-time-to-ship-screen.section-one: We’ve sent a pre-paid shipping label to:
shipping-time-to-ship-screen.section-two: In the next 3 business days, you need to:
shipping-time-to-ship-screen.step-three: 3. Give the labeled package to the shipping carrier.

listing-detail.contact_seller_for_vehicle_details: Contact the seller to confirm vehicle details
listing-detail.no_salvage_suffix: did not find a salvage record
listing-detail.history_no_salvage: did not find a salvage record
listing-detail.check_out_the_item: Check out this item on Redibs.
listing-detail.map_disclaimer: Map is approximate to keep seller’s location private.
listing-detail.share-subject: Check out this item on Redibs
listing-detail.unable-to-load-details: We were unable to load the page due to network connection issues.

camera.cover-photo-intruction: Photos are cropped in the feed and full size on item listings.

meetup.empty-alerts-subtitle: Sorry, there are no MeetUp spots in your area. Try searching in a different location.

delete-saved-list-dialog.title: Delete list
delete-saved-list-dialog.body: Are you sure you want to delete this list? This can't be undone.

delete-saved-item-dialog.title: Delete item
delete-saved-item-dialog.body: Are you sure you want to delete the item from this list? This can't be undone.

empty-saved-list.empty-list-subtitle: When you save an item to this list, you’ll see it here. Go find items to save to this list.

inspect.title: Inspect
inspect.help-title: Does the item match its description?
inspect.help-text: Tap “Request refund” within {{pluralizedWindow}} if there’s a problem. Otherwise, tap “Looks good,” and the sale will be final.

request-refund.title: Request Refund
request-refund.input-help: Tell the seller why the item is not what they described.
request-refund.photos: Please send the seller photos in chat.
request-refund.seller-respond-window: The seller has {{pluralizedWindow}} to respond. If they accept, we’ll email you a shipping label to return the item.
request-refund.refund-payment: You’ll get ${{refundAmount}} once you ship the item.
request-refund.help-center: Redibs can help resolve the issue if the seller declines or ignores your request.

inspect-window-expired.explanation: After an item arrives, you have {{inspectionWindowDays}} days to inspect it and let the seller know if anything’s wrong.
inspect-window-expired.window-passed: That window has passed, so you won't be able to request a refund.

inspection-closed.status: You inspected this item already and said it looks good
inspection-closed.no-refund: You can no longer request a refund for this item.

claim-submitted.status: You’ve reported an issue to Redibs.
claim-submitted.email: Our customer service team will email you.

seller-view-requested-refund.title: Refund Request
seller-view-requested-refund.expiration: You have until {{expirationDate}} to accept or decline this refund.
seller-view-requested-refund.reason-description: The buyer had this to say: {{returnReasonDescription}}
seller-view-requested-refund.fine-print: If you accept, the buyer must ship the item back at no cost to you. When they ship, the sale will be canceled.

seller-view-expired-refund.buyer: This request has expired. The buyer has until {{expirationDate}} to contact Redibs if they are still concerned about the item.

seller-view-declined-refund.buyer: The buyer has until {{expirationDate}} to contact Redibs if they are still concerned about the item.

seller-accepted-refund.title: Accepted
seller-accepted-refund.subtitle: What’s next
seller-accepted-refund.next-step-1: We’ll send the buyer a shipping label at no cost to you.
seller-accepted-refund.next-step-2: The buyer must ship your item before {{shipDate}} in order to get a refund.
seller-accepted-refund.next-step-3: We’ll cancel the sale and refund the buyer once they ship the item.

seller-declined-refund.title: Decline
seller-declined-refund.subtitle: You chose to decline the refund
seller-declined-refund.input-description: Please explain to the buyer why you want to decline the request.
seller-declined-refund.footer: The buyer has {{buyerProtectionClaimWindowDays}} more days to contact Redibs if they are still concerned about the item.

merchant-refund.title: Request Refund
merchant-refund.subtitle: What went wrong?
merchant-refund.email: The seller will respond to you via your email:

merchant-refund-description.title: Request Refund
merchant-refund-description.input-description: Tell the seller in more detail what went wrong.
merchant-refund-description.next-step-1: The seller will respond to you via your email:
merchant-refund-description.next-step-2: Be ready to provide photos and more info to the seller.

merchant-refund-submitted.title: Request Sent
merchant-refund-submitted.status: Check your email for the seller’s response.
merchant-refund-submitted.disabled-button-context: Please wait 2 business days for the seller to respond before getting help from Redibs.
merchant-refund-submitted.enabled-button-context: You are now elgible to get help from Redibs.

merchant-refund-window-expired.title: Refund Request
merchant-refund-window-expired.info-1: After an item arrives, you have 30 days to inspect it and let the seller know if anything’s wrong.
merchant-refund-window-expired.info-2: That window has passed, so you won't be able to request a refund. If you are already in conversation with the seller, you may continue to do so.

merchant-bpc-submitted.title: Claim Sent
merchant-bpc-submitted.status: Your claim is under review by Redibs customer support.
merchant-bpc-submitted.next-step-1: Redibs will respond to you via your email:
merchant-bpc-submitted.next-step-2: Be ready to provide photos and more info

merchant-bpc-denied.title: Claim Denied
merchant-bpc-denied.next-step: Please check your email for any correspondence from Redibs:

purchase-protection.title: Redibs Purchase Protection
purchase-protection.c2c-purchase=protection-text: Items shipped through Redibs come with a 2-day purchase protection.
purchase-protection.b2c-purchase=protection-text: This item comes with 30-day purchase protection.

rating.didnt-sell-on-redibs: I didn't sell it on Redibs
rating.already-rated-body: Your feedback has been saved and can't be changed.

receipt.title: Receipt
receipt.purchased-status: We’ll update your tracking info once your item has been shipped.
receipt.missing-tracking:
The seller shipped the order without providing a tracking ID.
Questions? Please contact the seller for info.

order-confirmation.title:
Thank you,
your order was placed!
order-confirmation.subtitle: Look for a confirmation email and an app notification with details on next steps.
